CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 21, 1956, pg. 11, reads: "For Love and Service - An impressive observance at Central Baptist Church, Jan. 16, honored the Rev. E. S. Calloway and his wife, center, on the occasion of their golden wedding anniversary, and cited him for fifty years of active service in ministry. The happy pair were attended by the Rev. W. D. Petett and Mrs. B. R. Hairston, as the Rev. B. S. Mason read the marriage vows of reaffirmation.  Members of the Baptist Ministers' Conference, the Wives Auxiliary raised $1,032 honorarium. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Rev. B. S. Mason conducting wedding vow renewal service for Rev. E. S. Calloway and his wife on their 50th wedding anniversary, with Rev. W. D. Petett wearing dark tie on left, and Mrs. B. R. Hairston on right, in Central Baptist Church
